tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerPurchaseHistory (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Customer ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), customer_email VARCHAR(50), customer_phone VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE Purchase ( purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, purchase_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id) );
CREATE TABLE Campaign ( campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(50), campaign_description TEXT, campaign_start_date DATE, campaign_end_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE purchases (

purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id INT,
product_id INT,
purchase_date DATE,
amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_items (
    purchase_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES purchases(purchase_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);
